summary: A visual, poetic depiction of Belfast and its citizens, told with love and passion of someone, who has left the city many years ago but is still fascinated by it. Themes brought up in the ... See full summary Â»
cast: Mark Cousins|Rosie McKee|Maud Bell|Helena Bereen|Sean Perry|Shane McCaffrey|Patricia Brook|Cherrie Ontop|Sassie Longshaft|Lalor Roddy|Frank Cannon|Felicity McKee|Simon Millar
title: I Am Belfast
